Azure Architecture for E-commerce Platform

Compute:
- Azure App Service (Premium P2v3 tier) running 24/7 for both production and development environments
- No autoscaling configured, instances always at max capacity
- All resources using pay-as-you-go pricing with no reservations or savings plans

Storage:
- Azure Blob Storage (Premium performance tier) for all data including logs and backups
- No lifecycle management policies configured
- Full backups taken hourly with 365-day retention for dev/test environments

Database:
- Azure SQL Database (Business Critical tier) running continuously
- Point-in-time restore backups retained for 35 days in all environments including dev/test
- No database scaling policies, provisioned for peak load at all times

Monitoring:
- Application Insights configured but no one reviews the data regularly
- No cost alerts or budgets configured in Azure Cost Management
- Multiple orphaned resources from previous deployments still running (unused VMs, NICs, disks)

Operations:
- Manual deployment processes, no CI/CD automation
- Development team frequently provisions new resources for testing without cleanup
- No tagging strategy or resource organization for cost allocation
